effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Strength by 2,145, up to 10,728.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2.2 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,069 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 186 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Mantle of Crimson Blades

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of Silvermoon City.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
